alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 9:38AM CDT until June 10 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 937 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Eudora to 6 miles south of Galion to Sterlington, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Gassoway around 950 AM CDT. Start, Millikin and Shelburn around 955 AM CDT. Lake Providence, Rayville, Warden, Holly Ridge and Alto around 1000 AM CDT. Delhi and Archibald around 1005 AM CDT. Mangham around 1010 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Perryville, Collinston, Pioneer, Kilbourne, Forest, Oak Ridge and Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
